title: ‘Not Looking for Revenge’: Vollering Seeks Redemption Not Retribution After Tumultuous SD Worx Split
content:
Vollering opens new chapter with FDJ-Suez on Thursday in Valenciana in first step toward Tour de France showdown with Kopecky and Niewiadoma.

Read the full article at ‘Not Looking for Revenge’: Vollering Seeks Redemption Not Retribution After Tumultuous SD Worx Split on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
